data.title: Gilligan Stillwater: 10 facts about Billy Gibbons's wife
data.meta_description: GILLIGAN STILLWATER is the gorgeous woman behind rock stars Billy Gibbons's stunning music career. Check out some quick facts about ZZ Top's band manager
data.text:
If you are a rock music lover, Billy Gibbons is no stranger. The 71-year-old American musician has built an impressive career for himself. In addition, his wife, Gilligan Stillwater, has been an incredible support system, working behind the scenes as a friend, companion, and band manager.

It has been said that behind every succesful man is a woman. Billy Gibbons is a gifted singer, songwriter, and guitarist. His wife frequently accompanies him to music shows and other events. So, what are some facts about Gilligan Stillwater?

Gilligan Stillwater profile summary

Original name: Ellen J. Oetjen

Current name: Gilligan Stillwater

Nickname: Gilligan

Date of birth: March 8, 1965

Age: 56 years old

Zodiac sign: Pisces

Place of birth: United States of America

Nationality: American

Marital status:

Husband: Billy Gibbons

Profession: Businessperson, actress

Height: 5ft, 2 inches

Weight: 55kgs

Hair: Blonde

Eyes: Brown

Facts about Gilligan Stillwater

Some netizens have been wondering, ''Is Billy Gibbons married?'' Yes, the rock star is officially married to Gilligan. So, here are some facts about Billy Gibbons's wife:

1. She was born Ellen J. Oetjen

Gilligan's original name was Ellen J. Otjen, but she later changed it to Gilligan Stillwater. The reason for her name change remains undisclosed. However, Oetjen is a German name, showing that she could have mixed ethnicity.

2. Gilligan was born in 1965

There is not much information in public about Gilligan Stillwater's biography. However, according to sources, the 56-year-old was born when war tension in Vietnam saw America intervene.

3. Stillwater's background is a mystery

The rock star's wife has not disclosed any details of her parents and upbringing. Her educational background is also unknown. Additionally, she has also not revealed the details of her siblings, if any.

3. Gibbons's wife is not on social media

It is rare to find a celebrity who is not on social media in this day and age. Stillwater is one of them. She prefers to keep a low profile and liver her life away from the glare of social media. Gilligan does not have any active social platforms.

4. Met Billy when she was 15 years old

Gilligan has a unique love story. She met the love of her life when she was a teenager. The details of where they met remain a mystery. However, they remained friends for a long time and became close after meeting several times in Europe. Gibbons is 16 years older than her.

5. Gilligan got married in 2005

Gilligan Stillwater and Billy Gibbons tied the knot on December 14, 2005, after being close friends for about 30 years. According to Biographypedia, Gibbons wanted to experience everything first before settling in marriage because life is too short. The couple has enjoyed marital bliss for almost 16 years now.

6. Stillwaters and her husband do not have any children

The celebrity couple does not have any children together. It is rumoured that Billy has a child from a previous relationship, but these claims remain unconfirmed. None of them has discussed this matter publicly.

7. She manages his band, ZZ Top

Billy Gibbons is the lead singer and guitarist of the ZZ Top band. He formed the band in 1969, and they have several albums to their name. His wife has been managing the team since 2005 and organizes their tours.

8. The 56-year-old has appeared in several movies

Besides managing her husband's band, Gilligan has also appeared in some films. These include Snake & Mongoose (2013), Pickinâ€™ & Grinnin (2010), and in the first episode of The Snake And Mongoose Chronicles (2011). In addition, she once made a guest appearance in the show Criss Angel Mindfreak.

9. Billy's wife has outstanding physical features

Stillwater has a gorgeous body. She stands at 5 feet ad 2 inches and weighs 55kgs. In addition, she has long blonde hair and beautiful brown eyes. To crown it all, she has a big smile which reflects her internal beauty.

10. She lives a lavish lifestyle, thanks to her wealthy husband

According to Celebrity Net Worth, billy has a financial worth of $60 million. His wife enjoys his fortune of luxurious cars and expansive mansions. Gilligan also enjoys sporting activities like ice hockey and table tennis.

Gilligan Stillwater embodies beauty and brains and has gained fame through her husband's successful career. With her tireless efforts, her husband's career is bound to keep thriving as she continues to enjoy the fruit of her work.

Mecca was born in October 1995 to Persia White and Saul Williams. Her father is a rapper, singer, and songwriter from America. Her parents separated in 2009 when Mecca was 14 years old. Her mother then married British actor Joseph Morgan, who is now her stepdad. Check out the article and read more about this talented actress.
